channel.title: Best Greenday Songs?
channel.description: Give me Novocaine, is my opinion :P either that or horseshoes and hand grenades

item.title: Best Greenday Songs?
item.dc:creator: @Joeli Joeli
item.description:
@Joeli wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:345977”]Bands that play songs that require talent to play and sing, also writing at least some of their own songs is a plus.

There are so many, it’s hard to just list a few, but I’ll try:
Lynyrd Skynyrd, Creedence Clearwater Revival (CCR), Steppenwolf, Ralph Stanley, The Country Gentlemen, Hank Williams Sr., Johnny Cash, etc etc[/quote]
You forgot The Hormigon Sound!
(My uncle is the drumps player)

Btw. 4 me the bests songs are:
Jesus Of Suburvia, Bouleveard Of Broken Dreams, Holiday , American Idiot & the best is Brain Stew

Read full topic

item.title: Best Greenday Songs?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:14, topic:345977”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=442356.msg3249304#msg3249304 date=1277613115]

How about none of them? Haha. I hate bands like this that have no talent and people seem to think they are the best thing around. (many others besides greenday fit into this category, metallica is another one)

Tell me what a good band to you is then.

Bands that play songs that require talent to play and sing, also writing at least some of their own songs is a plus.

There are so many, it’s hard to just list a few, but I’ll try:
Lynyrd Skynyrd, Creedence Clearwater Revival (CCR), Steppenwolf, Ralph Stanley, The Country Gentlemen, Hank Williams Sr., Johnny Cash, etc etc
[/quote]
<3333333333333333333333333333333333333333 I would also like to throw some Black Sabbath, Led Zeppelin, and Jethro Tull into that.[/quote]
+=

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:345977”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=442356.msg3249304#msg3249304 date=1277613115]

How about none of them? Haha. I hate bands like this that have no talent and people seem to think they are the best thing around. (many others besides greenday fit into this category, metallica is another one)

Tell me what a good band to you is then.

Bands that play songs that require talent to play and sing, also writing at least some of their own songs is a plus.

There are so many, it’s hard to just list a few, but I’ll try:
Lynyrd Skynyrd, Creedence Clearwater Revival (CCR), Steppenwolf, Ralph Stanley, The Country Gentlemen, Hank Williams Sr., Johnny Cash, etc etc
[/quote]

ILY, but I would have to add A7X into that.[/quote]Is the shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Greenday Songs?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

American Idiot (the album) in general, Good Riddance (Time of your life), 21 Guns, When I come around, welcome to paradise, longview.

I <3 Green Day. They’re actually the only band that I have EVERY album from. Now I cba to track down all the albums they’ve released under other band names, but oh well.

Read full topic
